name: Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG)
description: Heart bypass surgery to improve blood flow to the heart by creating new pathways around blocked arteries.

steps.title: Get Diagnosis in U.S.
steps.description: Visit cardiologist for stress test, EKG, and angiogram to confirm blockages. Get all medical reports and imaging.

steps.title: Choose Hospital in India
steps.description: Contact top cardiac hospitals in Delhi. Share your medical reports for cost estimate and appointment scheduling.

steps.title: Apply for Medical Visa
steps.description: Apply for Indian medical visa online. Upload passport, hospital appointment, and doctor referral letter.

steps.title: Book Travel & Accommodation
steps.description: Book roundtrip flights to Delhi. Arrange accommodation near hospital. Notify hospital of arrival date.

steps.title: Pre-Op & Surgery
steps.description: Arrive 2-3 days before surgery. Complete pre-op tests. Undergo CABG surgery with 1-2 days ICU stay.

steps.title: Recovery & Return
steps.description: 5-7 days hospital stay. Post-op care and physiotherapy. Return to U.S. after 2 weeks total.

name: Dental Implants & Full Mouth Reconstruction
description: Complete dental restoration using titanium implants to replace missing teeth with natural-looking prosthetics.

steps.title: Dental Consultation in U.S.
steps.description: Visit dentist for X-rays, CT scan, and treatment plan. Get all dental records and imaging.

steps.title: Select Dental Clinic
steps.description: Choose accredited dental clinic in Delhi. Share dental records for treatment plan and cost estimate.

steps.title: Apply for Medical Visa
steps.description: Apply for Indian medical visa with dental clinic appointment confirmation and treatment plan.

steps.title: Travel to India
steps.description: Book flights to Delhi. Arrange accommodation near dental clinic. Schedule consultation appointment.

steps.title: Dental Treatment
steps.description: Initial consultation and treatment planning. Implant placement surgery. Temporary prosthetics.

steps.title: Follow-up & Return
steps.description: Post-op care and instructions. Schedule follow-up visits. Return to U.S. with temporary teeth.

name: Spinal Surgery (Discectomy, Laminectomy, Fusion)
description: Surgical procedures to treat spinal conditions including herniated discs, spinal stenosis, and degenerative disc disease.

steps.title: Spine Evaluation in U.S.
steps.description: Visit spine specialist for MRI, CT scan, and nerve conduction studies. Get complete diagnostic reports.

steps.title: Choose Spine Center
steps.description: Select accredited spine surgery center in Delhi. Share imaging and reports for surgical plan.

steps.title: Medical Visa Application
steps.description: Apply for Indian medical visa with spine center appointment and surgical recommendation.

steps.title: Travel Arrangements
steps.description: Book flights to Delhi. Arrange accommodation with accessibility features. Plan post-surgery care.

steps.title: Surgery & Recovery
steps.description: Pre-op evaluation. Spinal surgery procedure. Post-op care and physical therapy.

steps.title: Rehabilitation & Return
steps.description: Inpatient rehabilitation. Discharge planning. Return to U.S. with recovery instructions.

name: In Vitro Fertilization (IVF) Treatment
description: Assisted reproductive technology to help couples conceive through egg retrieval, fertilization, and embryo transfer.

steps.title: Fertility Consultation in U.S.
steps.description: Visit fertility specialist for evaluation. Complete hormone tests, ultrasound, and fertility assessment.

steps.title: Select IVF Clinic
steps.description: Choose accredited IVF center in Delhi. Share fertility reports for treatment plan and success rates.

steps.title: Medical Visa Process
steps.description: Apply for Indian medical visa with IVF clinic appointment and fertility treatment plan.

steps.title: Travel to India
steps.description: Book flights to Delhi. Arrange accommodation near IVF clinic. Schedule initial consultation.

steps.title: IVF Treatment Cycle
steps.description: Ovarian stimulation. Egg retrieval. Fertilization and embryo culture. Embryo transfer.

steps.title: Follow-up & Pregnancy Test
steps.description: Post-transfer care. Pregnancy test after 2 weeks. Return to U.S. with results.
